# pd-skeleton

## Usage

```html
<pd-skeleton width="50rem" height="64px"></pd-skeleton>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                            | Type     | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------- | -------- | -------- |
| `height` | `height`  | Sets the height of the skeleton loader | `string` | `'32px'` |
| `width`  | `width`   | Sets the widht of the skeleton loader  | `string` | `'100%'` |
